function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Vulnerable populations at risk due to respiratory pandemics","Impact":"Increased vulnerability and potential for higher transmission rates","Mitigation":"Inclusion of vulnerable populations in pandemic planning, provision of targeted support and resources","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping for identifying high-risk areas, urban technology for disaster management and pandemic preparedness","People":"Underhoused, homeless, people with disabilities, elderly Canadian Chinese","Owner":"Public health authorities, urban planners, policymakers"},{"Description":"Lack of future-oriented urban planning and design post-COVID-19","Impact":"Ineffective response to future pandemics, missed opportunities for reforming policy systems","Mitigation":"Reforming policy systems to give urbanists more influence, integration of pandemic preparedness in long-term urban planning and design strategies","Technologies":"Urban technology, data analytics, territorial governance reform","People":"Urbanists, planners, policymakers","Owner":"Policy makers, urban planners, public health authorities"}]}
